channel.title: Tvbox on MLOG
channel.description: Recent content in Tvbox on MLOG

item.title: Tvbox Config
item.description: tvbox config 如 https://cj.lziapi.com/api.php/provide/vod 获取 JSON 格式数据： https://cj.lziapi.com/api.php/provide/vod/at/json 获取 XML 格式数据： https://cj.lziapi.com/api.php/provide/vod/at/xml 指定来自 lzm3u8 的资源，并获取 XML： https://cj.lziapi.com/api.php/provide/vod/from/lzm3u8/at/xml/ tvbox json { "sites": [ { "key": "lziapi", "name": "量子资源", "type": 1, "api": "https://cj.lziapi.com/api.php/provide/vod/at/json", "searchable": 1, "quickSearch": 1, "filterable": 1 } ], "parses": [], "lives": [], "flags": [] } 多个 { "sites": [ { "key": "xb", "name": "资源站-xb", "type": 1, "api": "https://xingba111.com/api.php/provide/vod/at/json", "searchable": 0, "quickSearch": 0, "filterable": 0 }, { "key": "lziapi", "name": "资源站-lziapi", "type": 1, "api": "https://cj.
